ygData.subject: Re: Now about 1hs vs 2hs Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: Reposte is a counter attack.  When you reposte you get an extra swing with your primary weapon.  You can reposte multiple times per round.  And I m learning
ygData.messageBody:
Reposte is a counter attack. When you reposte you get an extra swing with your primary weapon. You can reposte multiple times per round. And I'm learning that reposte is damn cool when weilding a 2h that hits for up to 44 :)

>>> David Rogers <derogers334@...> 5.24.99 3:21:00 PM >>>
I know nothing about Riposte; neither of my characters have it, and no
one on any of the boards/lists/sites I read has said anything about it.
Anyone have info re: Riposte? I'd love to hear it.
